info.lead: Overview of the MP's basic information.
text: We obtained the content for this card from the web site {link} (parliamentary group, age, membership in working bodies) and the web site of State Election Commission (the number of votes received). For all other information we contacted PR departments of the parliamentary groups.

We received information from NSi, SD, (then) ZaAB and ZL. SMC directed us to their web site and SDS directed us to the web site of the National Assembly. We collected the missing data using the Google search engine and gave all the parliamentary parties an opportunity to make corrections before publication.

link.text: National Assembly of the Republic of Slovenia
